pages.text: Nautilus are passive creatures that can be found underwater caves and ravines, except in cold or frozen oceans.$(br2)When a Drowned, Squid or you are near of one of this creatures or if they are hit they will perform a few dashes to escape.$(br2)They are immune to buble columns and are unaffected by their pull.

On death they may drop a Nautilus Shell, you can use it to craft blocks like Coralstone or Conduits.$(br2)You can capture these creatures with Buckets, if you release one from this Bucket, it will not despawn.
